attributes.description:
Come with Tedi & Troy and experience the lush tropics, the tranquil green rice fields and
the ocean breeze in your very own private beach sanctuary and spa. 
This private resort is used by the world's best yoga teachers to facilitate instant ease and relaxation
for your mind, body and soul.
